resources.string: Please, press the button to open the speech window

This app allows user to convert text to speech and speech to text. The app uses the TextToSpeech class and the SpeechRecognizer class. Both of them provide for Android. Also, the app uses the ML Kit language identification API for Android.

In the first section, the user can introduce a text, then, the user press a button and the app converts the text into voice. The app can recognize the language of the text. The app has been tested for English, Spanish, and Italian languages.

In the second section, the user can select between three different languages: English, Spanish, and Italian. Then, the user press a button to open a window where the user can speak, and the app converts the voice into text.
